cause.description:
Regular Tigers are in some parts of the world, but they are not endangared species, but white tigers are not, they are being killed for their fur and soon they are not going to be a part of the world. Anthoer problem that is making white tigers disapear is deforestation, the forest and rainforests are being destroyed. White Tigers have the right to live as well as other animals, and even if us Humans have to protect them, it is a risk we have to take to save them. By doing this, many people will realize that this is neccesary and will do that with other animals such Polar Bears. So please pay attention to our environemnt, because in a few years, many animals will be gone forever.... thats right forever.. =(
PLEASE help by inviting all your friends!
1. They can survive in the wild, but not as well as in human care
2. they are killed for their fur and are very unique animals
3. their environmet is deing destroyed which can also damage many more animals/plants
cause.mission: To try and save them from extinction
cause.name: Save Not Only White Tigers But Wildlife Too
